Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_ksh96d3e&referenceId=1_ksh96d3e&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: Wall Street futures point to a tepid start to equity trading on Monday ahead of a flood of earnings from big names including Hasbro, Walt Disney, Tyson Foods and drug maker Pfizer. Oil prices fall $1 on positive signals from U.S.-Iran talks, but traders are still wary of geopolitical tensions over Ukraine.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3gsVI20
